name: Stack Overflow Full Height Code
description: Remove the maximum height of Stack Overflow code samples, so they display in their natural height on the page. No more extra scrollbar for longer blocks of code!
additional_info:
Stack Overflow and other Stack Exchange sites use max-height:600px to limit the height of code samples. If the code is longer than that, you not only have to scroll the page, you also have to scroll the code block separately.

This userstyle removes the max-height:600px, so code samples display in their full natural height and scroll along with the page instead having their own separate scrollbars.
